title: FitFile Schema
description: Schema for a FitFile containing workout definitions

TextEvent.description: In-workout message overlay at a given time offset

TimeOffset.description: Seconds from segment start when the text appears

oneOf.title: Zone 1
oneOf.description: Very easy pedaling for active recovery rides.

oneOf.title: Zone 2
oneOf.description: Steady pace for long endurance efforts.

oneOf.title: Zone 3
oneOf.description: Moderate intensity just below threshold.

oneOf.title: Zone 4
oneOf.description: Sustained efforts at lactate threshold.

oneOf.title: Zone 5
oneOf.description: High-intensity intervals targeting VO₂ max.

oneOf.title: Zone 6
oneOf.description: Short, all-out efforts to build anaerobic capacity.

oneOf.title: Zone 7
oneOf.description: Maximal sprint efforts for neuromuscular power.

oneOf.title: Zone 1
oneOf.description: 50–60% HRmax

oneOf.title: Zone 2
oneOf.description: 60–70% HRmax

oneOf.title: Zone 3
oneOf.description: 70–80% HRmax

oneOf.title: Zone 4
oneOf.description: 80–90% HRmax

oneOf.title: Zone 5
oneOf.description: 90–95% HRmax

oneOf.title: Zone 6
oneOf.description: 95–100% HRmax

oneOf.title: Zone 7
oneOf.description: >100% HRmax

WorkoutCategory.description: Overarching training category or intensity goal

oneOf.title: Recovery
oneOf.description: Very easy effort for active recovery rides or runs.

oneOf.title: Base Endurance 1
oneOf.description: Steady, low-intensity endurance work.

oneOf.title: Base Endurance 2
oneOf.description: Moderate endurance to build aerobic capacity.

oneOf.title: Tempo Runs
oneOf.description: Sustained efforts slightly below threshold.

oneOf.title: Threshold Training
oneOf.description: Efforts at or near lactate threshold.

oneOf.title: VO2max Intervals
oneOf.description: High-intensity intervals to raise VO₂ max.

oneOf.title: Anaerobic Capacity
oneOf.description: Short, very hard efforts to boost anaerobic power.

oneOf.title: Sprint Intervals
oneOf.description: All-out sprint efforts with full recovery.

oneOf.title: Muscular Endurance
oneOf.description: Sustained high force at low cadence or pace.

oneOf.title: Technique and Coordination
oneOf.description: Skill-focused drills for form and efficiency.

WorkoutType.description: Type of sport for this workout

oneOf.title: Cycling
oneOf.description: Bike workouts, road or indoor trainer.

oneOf.title: Running
oneOf.description: Outdoor or treadmill running sessions.

oneOf.title: Swimming
oneOf.description: Pool or open-water swim workouts.

oneOf.title: Golf
oneOf.description: Fitness and mobility routines for golf.

oneOf.title: Strength Training
oneOf.description: Gym-based resistance and weightlifting sessions.

oneOf.title: Rowing
oneOf.description: On-water or ergometer rowing workouts.

oneOf.title: Warmup
oneOf.description: Easy effort to prepare the body for work.

oneOf.title: Interval
oneOf.description: Repeated high/low intensity efforts.

oneOf.title: Ramp
oneOf.description: Gradual increase or decrease in intensity.

oneOf.title: SteadyState
oneOf.description: Sustained, constant-intensity effort.

oneOf.title: Cooldown
oneOf.description: Easy effort to flush out metabolites.

oneOf.title: Rest
oneOf.description: Passive recovery; no pedaling or minimal effort.

oneOf.title: FreeRide
oneOf.description: Unstructured riding with no specific target.

FitFile_Version.description: Version of the FitFile format; currently always 0.1

Workouts.description: Lists all defined workouts in this FitFile

Workout_Priority.description: If the workout contains more than one target, priority defines which to hold

Planned_Training_Load.description: What is the planned training load for this workout

Tasks.description: List of all workout steps; any number of entries allowed

Duration.description: How long is this step in seconds

Distance.description: Optional distance target in meters (for running or swimming)

Target_Power.description: Fixed target power for this step

Target_Heartrate.description: Fixed target heart rate for this step

Cadence.description: Fixed target cadence for this step

Repeat.description: Number of times this Step should be repeated

Description.description: Details on duration, intensity or repetitions
